ChunkUserDataObjectCache Class Reference

This class is a cache of ChunkUserDataObjects, so we can create their python objects when they are bound and not before. More...

Detailed Description

This class is a cache of ChunkUserDataObjects, so we can create their python objects when they are bound and not before.
